glsa.title: UnRTF: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in UnRTF, the worst of which may result in execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: UnRTF is a command-line program which converts RTF documents to other formats.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UnRTF. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All UnRTF users should upgrade to the latest version:
